title: Sales volume of USB flash drives in Germany 2004 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales volume in millions, with a total of 15 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2008 to 2004.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2016 to 2013.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2013 to 2010.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2016.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2010 to 2008.
gold: USB flash drives experienced fluctuating sales numbers in recent years , with almost 12.9 million units sold in 2018 . Meanwhile , revenue generated amounted to 155 million euros in the same year , a decrease on the one before . Storage media USB flash drives revolutionized data storage for computer users everywhere when they emerged on the market , joining such well-known storage media as floppy discs , hard drives and optical storage units like CD-R and CD-RW discs .
